member.name: IContext.EnumContextProps
member.summary: Returns an interface pointer that can be used to enumerate the context properties in this context.
member.param: The address of the variable that receives the new interface pointer.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IContext.GetProperty
member.summary: Retrieves the specified context property from the context.
member.param: The GUID that uniquely identifies the context property to be retrieved.
The address of the variable that receives the flags associated with the property.
The address of the variable that receives the interface pointer of the requested context property.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IContext.RemoveProperty
member.summary: Removes the specified context property from the context.
member.param: The GUID that uniquely identifies the context property to be removed.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IContext.SetProperty
member.summary: Adds the specified context property to the object context.
member.param: A GUID that uniquely identifies this context property.
This parameter is reserved and must be zero.
A pointer to the context property to be added.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.
